author: Franklin
title: A Prayer
text: Quote: Originally Posted by Franklin Though I don't believe in a supernatural god who can hear me, I do think prayer serves well as an emotional release. So those few of you who have any morality left, please join me in prayer. I pray for the destruction of evil modern culture. I pray for the end of liberalism and feminism. I pray for the success of strong moral religions. I pray for tradition gender roles and stable families. I pray for civility and free speech uncensored by politically correct zealots. And I pray for human decency which has been almost completely destroyed by modern culture. How about you just move to Saudia Arabia, you'll be happy, we'll be happy...it's a win/win.
